resources.string: You must enable biometric security in your device settings.\n\nIf you already have biometry enabled, you may need to enable a different biometric option to meet the security threshold of the Vault App.
Your device does not support biometric security at the level required for the Vault App.
Unable to open biometry settings. Please open device settings.
Too many failed attempts, please try again later.
Biometry approval failed. Please try again.
Biometry is required to access the Vault App
Unable to show biometry to gain access to the app.\n\nPlease authenticate device from lock screen.
